IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO OFFER A STRATEGY-BASED, COMPREHENSIVE AND CHALLENGING EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM FOR NON-TRADITIONAL LEARNERS WHO DEMONSTRATE ACADEMIC POTENTIAL
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE A STRATEGY-BASED, COMPREHENSIVE AND CHALLENGING SCHOOL EXPERIENCE FOR STUDENTS WITH DIAGNOSED LEARNING DISABILITIES
IRS990.Desc: PRIVATE PRIMARY SCHOOL AND PRIVATE HIGH SCHOOL THAT PROMOTE THE EDUCATION OF NON-TRADITIONAL LEARNERS WHO DEMONSTRATE ACADEMIC POTENTIAL

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 IN ACCORDANCE WITH ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION ("ASC") TOPIC 740, "INCOME TAXES", WHICH PROVIDES STANDARDS FOR ESTABLISHING AND CLASSIFYING ANY TAX PROVISIONS FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE SCHOOL IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO FEDERAL OR STATE TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2020 AND PRIOR YEARS.
REFERENCE TO THE RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS INCLUDED ITS ADVERTISING IN A LOCAL NEWSPAPER.

THE CRAIG SCHOOL USES SCHOOL SERVICES AND AN ON-LINE SYSTEM TO PROCESS FINANCIAL AID APPLICATIONS. PARENTS OF STUDENTS COMPLETE THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT FORM AND SUBMIT IT ON-LINE ALONG WITH THE REQUIRED COPIES OF TAX RETURNS AND PROOF OF INCOME. A NEED ANALYSIS REPORT IS PREPARED WHICH SUGGESTS THE AMOUNT FAMILIES CAN CONTRIBUTE TOWARD EDUCATIONAL COSTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENTIRE BOARD IS PROVIDED THE FINAL FORM 990 FOR REVIEW BEFORE THE RETURN IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS AND EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE INDEPENDENT BOARD MEMBERS AND INPUT FROM A PROFESSIONAL RECRUITING FIRM AS WELL AS A REVIEW OF COMPARABLE NJAIS BENCHMARKS. THE DELIBERATION PROCESS AND DECISION IS DOCUMENTED AND MAINTAINED BY THE SCHOOL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WRITTEN REQUESTS FOR INFORMATION MUST BE SUBMITTED AND ARE SUBSEQUENTLY REVIEWED FOR APPROVAL
THE FINANCE COMMITEE ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
